channel.description: The latest incident information for England's motorway and trunk routes provided by Highways England

channel.title: Events for the South West

item.author: info@highwaysengland.co.uk
item.description: Event Reason : Road closure to high sided vehicles. Event Location : The A38 eastbound between the junctions with the A388 and the A3064 . Event Status : Currently Active. Previous Reason : Following the earlier road management.
item.title: A38 eastbound between B3271 near Plymouth (east) and B3413 | Eastbound | RoadOrCarriagewayOrLaneManagement

item.author: info@highwaysengland.co.uk
item.description: Event Reason : Road closure to high sided vehicles. Event Location : The A38 westbound between the junctions with the A3064 and the A388 . Event Status : Currently Active. Previous Reason : Following the earlier road management.
item.title: A38 westbound between B3413 and B3271 near Plymouth (east) | Westbound | RoadOrCarriagewayOrLaneManagement

item.author: info@highwaysengland.co.uk
item.description: Event Location : The M48 westbound between junctions J1 and J2 . Event Time To Clear : The event is expected to clear between 10:45 and 11:00 on 30th December 2015. Event Status : Currently Active. Event Reason : Road closure to high sided vehicles. Return To Normal : Normal traffic conditions are expected between 09:15 and 09:30 on 30th December 2015. Lanes Closed : There are lane closures.
item.title: M48 westbound between J1 and J2 | Westbound | RoadOrCarriagewayOrLaneManagement

item.author: info@highwaysengland.co.uk
item.description: Event Reason : Road Management. Event Location : The M48 eastbound between junctions J2 and J1 . Lanes Closed : All lanes are closed. Event Status : Currently Active. Previous Reason : Following the earlier road closure to high sided vehicles.
item.title: M48 eastbound between J2 and J1 | Eastbound | RoadOrCarriagewayOrLaneManagement

item.author: info@highwaysengland.co.uk
item.description: Event Reason : Road Management. Event Location : The M48 westbound at junction J1 . Event Status : Currently Active.
item.title: M48 westbound within J1 | Westbound | RoadOrCarriagewayOrLaneManagement
